dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately 70 hours of video clips, with each clip averaging about 6 seconds in length, used for synthesizing dance movements from music.
dcterms:title: Dataset collected by Lee et al. (2019)

dcterms:description: A high-quality dataset consisting of 790 one-minute video clips of dance poses, totaling about 12 hours, collected to facilitate long-term dance generation with music.
dcterms:title: High-quality dataset collected by the authors

dcterms:creator: Zhe Cao
Tomas Simon
Shih-En Wei
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: A dataset used for human pose estimation, providing real-time multi-person 2D pose estimation using part affinity fields.
dcterms:title: OpenPose dataset for human pose estimation

dcterms:creator: Brian McFee

dcterms:description: A library for audio and music signal analysis in Python, used for extracting various audio features.
dcterms:title: Librosa for audio feature extraction
